heading: Agentic AI Architecture
description: Designing and implementing autonomous multi-agent systems that collaborate, reason, and execute complex workflows. Expertise in agent orchestration, tool calling, and distributed AI architectures.

heading: LLM Integration
description: Deep experience with GPT-4, Claude, and open-source models. Building production-grade LLM applications with advanced prompting, function calling, and retrieval-augmented generation.

heading: Tool & API Integration
description: Building intelligent agents with tool-use capabilities. Integrating external APIs, databases, search engines, and custom tools to extend agent functionality and autonomy.

heading: Full-Stack Development
description: Building complete AI-powered applications from frontend to backend. Modern web frameworks, API design, real-time interfaces, and scalable cloud deployments.
